items.sentence: Is it true that there are more than 1,000 windmills in Holland?
I'm busy. If that weren't the case, I'd accept your invitation.
The movie that Tom and I saw yesterday wasn't very interesting.
It's easier to blame someone else than it is to blame yourself.
I don't want you to blame yourself for the way things happened.
Even though Tom is over thirty, he still looks like a teenager.
It's been a long time since I've been in a situation like this.
He locked the door behind him as his mother had told him to do.
Those spikes under the bridge are overtly hostile architecture.
I'm afraid the loss will amount to one hundred million dollars.
